<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" id="S0.E1.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="S(\Delta\eta,\Delta\phi)=\frac{1}{N_{\text}{jets}}\frac{\rd^{2}N^{\text}{same}%
}{\rd\Delta\eta\,\rd\Delta\phi}.\ " display="block"><mrow><mrow><mrow><mi>S</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>η</mi></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>ϕ</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><msub><mi>N</mi><merror class="ltx_ERROR undefined undefined"><mtext>\text</mtext></merror></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mi>j</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>e</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>⁢</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><merror class="ltx_ERROR undefined undefined"><mtext>\rd</mtext></merror><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mi>N</mi><merror class="ltx_ERROR undefined undefined"><mtext>\text</mtext></merror></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>m</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><merror class="ltx_ERROR undefined undefined"><mtext>\rd</mtext></merror><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mpadded width="+1.7pt"><mi>η</mi></mpadded><mo>⁢</mo><merror class="ltx_ERROR undefined undefined"><mtext>\rd</mtext></merror><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>ϕ</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mo rspace="7.5pt">.</mo></mrow></math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" id="S0.E2.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="ME(\Delta\eta,\Delta\phi)=\frac{1}{N_{\text}{jets}}\frac{\rd^{2}N^{\text}{mix}%
}{\rd\Delta\eta\,\rd\Delta\phi}.\ " display="block"><mrow><mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>E</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>η</mi></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>ϕ</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><msub><mi>N</mi><merror class="ltx_ERROR undefined undefined"><mtext>\text</mtext></merror></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mi>j</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>e</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>⁢</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><merror class="ltx_ERROR undefined undefined"><mtext>\rd</mtext></merror><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mi>N</mi><merror class="ltx_ERROR undefined undefined"><mtext>\text</mtext></merror></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mi>m</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><merror class="ltx_ERROR undefined undefined"><mtext>\rd</mtext></merror><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mpadded width="+1.7pt"><mi>η</mi></mpadded><mo>⁢</mo><merror class="ltx_ERROR undefined undefined"><mtext>\rd</mtext></merror><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>ϕ</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow><mo rspace="7.5pt">.</mo></mrow></math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" id="S0.E3.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\frac{1}{N_{\text}{jets}}\frac{\rd^{2}N}{\rd\Delta\eta\,\rd\Delta\phi}=ME(0,0)%
\,\frac{S(\Delta\eta,\Delta\phi)}{ME(\Delta\eta,\Delta\phi).}" display="block"><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><msub><mi>N</mi><merror class="ltx_ERROR undefined undefined"><mtext>\text</mtext></merror></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mi>j</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>e</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>⁢</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><merror class="ltx_ERROR undefined undefined"><mtext>\rd</mtext></merror><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mi>N</mi></mrow><mrow><merror class="ltx_ERROR undefined undefined"><mtext>\rd</mtext></merror><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mpadded width="+1.7pt"><mi>η</mi></mpadded><mo>⁢</mo><merror class="ltx_ERROR undefined undefined"><mtext>\rd</mtext></merror><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>ϕ</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mi>M</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>E</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>0</mn><mo rspace="4.2pt" stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mo>⁢</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>S</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>η</mi></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>ϕ</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi><mi>E</mi><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>η</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>ϕ</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" id="S0.E4.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="B(\Delta\phi)=B_{0}(1+2V_{1}\cos{(\Delta\phi)}+2V_{2}\cos{(2\Delta\phi)}+2V_{3%
}\cos{(3\Delta\phi)})+A_{\mathrm{AS}}\exp{\bigg{[}-\bigg{(}\frac{\abs{\Delta%
\phi-\pi}}{\alpha}\bigg{)}^{\beta}\bigg{]}}," display="block"><mrow><mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>ϕ</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mrow><msub><mi>B</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>ϕ</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>ϕ</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>ϕ</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><msub><mi>A</mi><mi>AS</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mi>exp</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo maxsize="210%" minsize="210%">[</mo><mrow><mo>-</mo><msup><mrow><mo maxsize="210%" minsize="210%">(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mrow><merror class="ltx_ERROR undefined undefined"><mtext>\abs</mtext></merror><mo>⁢</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>ϕ</mi></mrow><mo>-</mo><mi>π</mi></mrow><mi>α</mi></mfrac><mo maxsize="210%" minsize="210%">)</mo></mrow><mi>β</mi></msup></mrow><mo maxsize="210%" minsize="210%">]</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>,</mo></mrow></math>
